name: 1000 South Clark
description: Brand new, probably THE BEST amenity space in the entire city (40,000 sq ft gym, basketball court, golf simulator, racquetball court). East-facing 1-beds are very well laid out.

name: 1001 South State
description: Brand new and one of the more popular buildings in the city. Beautiful amenities and excellent views. which makes them just a bit cheaper than 1000 S Clark.

name: Eleven Thirty
description: Hotel inspired apartments in south loop area. Lake views, 24-Hour Fitness Center, resort style pool with sun deck and conference room. Walking distance to Yolk, Zip Car Site and a Lakeside Market.
